mapper.sql: id, report_date, overdue_rate, repay_rate, overdue_rate_seven, overdue_rate_fourteen, overdue_rate_old, repay_rate_old, overdue_rate_new, repay_rate_new, expire_amount, overdue_amount, expire_amount_old, overdue_amount_old, expire_amount_new, overdue_amount_new, all_borrow_count, all_borrow_amount, all_repay_count, all_repay_amount, all_overdue_count, all_overdue_amount, overdue_rate_s1_amount, overdue_rate_s2_amount, overdue_rate_s3_amount, overdue_rate_s1_count, overdue_rate_s2_count, overdue_rate_s3_count, overdue_rate_amount, repay_rate_amount, overdue_rate_seven_amount, overdue_rate_fourteen_amount, overdue_rate_old_amount, repay_rate_old_amount, overdue_rate_new_amount, repay_rate_new_amount, create_time,overdue_rate_m3_count,overdue_rate_m3_amount
mapper.select: select id from report_repayment where report_date = #{reportDate}

select id,report_date,expire_amount,overdue_amount,expire_amount_old,overdue_amount_old, expire_amount_new,overdue_amount_new,overdue_rate_amount, repay_rate_amount,overdue_rate_seven_amount,overdue_rate_fourteen_amount, overdue_rate_old_amount,repay_rate_old_amount,overdue_rate_new_amount, repay_rate_new_amount
order by id desc

select count(1) as countAll,IFNULL(sum(bo.money_amount),0) as amountAll from asset_borrow_order bo where DATE_FORMAT(loan_time,'%Y-%m-%d') <= #{reportTime} and bo.loan_end_time >= #{reportTime} and bo.`status` in (21,30,23,34,-11,-20)

select count(1) as countAll,IFNULL(sum(rr.money_amount),0) as amountAll from asset_renewal_record rr where DATE_FORMAT(rr.old_repayment_time,'%Y-%m-%d') <= #{reportTime} and rr.repayment_time >= #{reportTime} and rr.`status` = 1

select count(1) as countAll,IFNULL(sum(repayment_principal + repayment_interest),0) as amountAll from asset_repayment where DATE_FORMAT(repayment_time,'%Y-%m-%d') <= #{reportTime} and `status` in (30,34)

select count(1) as countAll,IFNULL(sum(rr.money_amount),0) as amountAll,re.`status` from asset_renewal_record rr LEFT JOIN asset_repayment re ON re.id = rr.asset_repayment_id where DATE_FORMAT(rr.repayment_time,'%Y-%m-%d') <= #{reportTime} and rr.`status` = 1 and re.`status` in (30,21)

select count(1) as countAll,IFNULL(sum(repayment_principal + repayment_interest),0) as amountAll from asset_repayment where DATE_FORMAT(late_fee_start_time,'%Y-%m-%d') <= #{reportTime} and (`status` = -11 OR DATE_FORMAT(repayment_real_time,'%Y-%m-%d') > #{reportTime})
select count(1) as countAll,IFNULL(sum(bo.money_amount),0) as amountAll from asset_borrow_order bo where DATE_FORMAT(loan_time,'%Y-%m-%d') <= #{reportTime} and bo.`status` in (21,30,23,34,-11,-20)
select count(1) as countAll,IFNULL(sum(rr.money_amount),0) as amountAll from asset_renewal_record rr where DATE_FORMAT(rr.old_repayment_time,'%Y-%m-%d') <= #{reportTime} and rr.`status` = 1

select datediff(#{reportTime},DATE_FORMAT(late_fee_start_time,'%Y-%m-%d')) + 1 as lateDay, count(1) as countAll, IFNULL(sum(repayment_principal + repayment_interest),0) as amountAll from asset_repayment where DATE_FORMAT(late_fee_start_time,'%Y-%m-%d') <= #{reportTime} and (`status` = -11 OR DATE_FORMAT(repayment_real_time,'%Y-%m-%d') > #{reportTime}) group by datediff(#{reportTime},DATE_FORMAT(late_fee_start_time,'%Y-%m-%d'))

mapper.update:
update report_repayment
report_date = #{reportDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
overdue_rate = #{overdueRate,jdbcType=BIGINT},
repay_rate = #{repayRate,jdbcType=BIGINT},
overdue_rate_seven = #{overdueRateSeven,jdbcType=BIGINT},
overdue_rate_fourteen = #{overdueRateFourteen,jdbcType=BIGINT},
overdue_rate_old = #{overdueRateOld,jdbcType=BIGINT},
repay_rate_old = #{repayRateOld,jdbcType=BIGINT},
overdue_rate_new = #{overdueRateNew,jdbcType=BIGINT},
repay_rate_new = #{repayRateNew,jdbcType=BIGINT},
expire_amount = #{expireAmount,jdbcType=BIGINT},
overdue_amount = #{overdueAmount,jdbcType=BIGINT},
expire_amount_old = #{expireAmountOld,jdbcType=BIGINT},
overdue_amount_old = #{overdueAmountOld,jdbcType=BIGINT},
expire_amount_new = #{expireAmountNew,jdbcType=BIGINT},
overdue_amount_new = #{overdueAmountNew,jdbcType=BIGINT},
overdue_rate_amount = #{overdueRateAmount,jdbcType=BIGINT},
repay_rate_amount = #{repayRateAmount,jdbcType=BIGINT},
overdue_rate_seven_amount = #{overdueRateSevenAmount,jdbcType=BIGINT},
overdue_rate_fourteen_amount = #{overdueRateFourteenAmount,jdbcType=BIGINT},
overdue_rate_old_amount = #{overdueRateOldAmount,jdbcType=BIGINT},
repay_rate_old_amount = #{repayRateOldAmount,jdbcType=BIGINT},
overdue_rate_new_amount = #{overdueRateNewAmount,jdbcType=BIGINT},
repay_rate_new_amount = #{repayRateNewAmount,jdbcType=BIGINT},
all_borrow_count = #{allBorrowCount,jdbcType=BIGINT},
all_borrow_amount = #{allBorrowAmount,jdbcType=BIGINT},
all_repay_count = #{allRepayCount,jdbcType=BIGINT},
all_repay_amount = #{allRepayAmount,jdbcType=BIGINT},
all_overdue_count = #{allOverdueCount,jdbcType=BIGINT},
all_overdue_amount = #{allOverdueAmount,jdbcType=BIGINT},
overdue_rate_s1_amount = #{overdueRateS1Amount,jdbcType=BIGINT},
overdue_rate_s2_amount = #{overdueRateS2Amount,jdbcType=BIGINT},
overdue_rate_s3_amount = #{overdueRateS3Amount,jdbcType=BIGINT},
overdue_rate_s1_count = #{overdueRateS1Count,jdbcType=BIGINT},
overdue_rate_s2_count = #{overdueRateS2Count,jdbcType=BIGINT},
overdue_rate_s3_count = #{overdueRateS3Count,jdbcType=BIGINT},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
overdue_rate_m3_amount = #{overdueRateM3Amount,jdbcType=BIGINT},
overdue_rate_m3_count = #{overdueRateM3Count,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
